code:
```
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic L,
    input logic q_in,
    input logic r_in,
    output logic Q
);

always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (L) begin
        Q <= r_in;
    end else begin
        Q <= Q; // Retain previous state
    end
end

endmodule
[DONE]
```

);

end
